name: Z1
headline: Digital bank for teenagers in LatAm connected to prepaid card
description: Z1 is a digital banking app made for teenagers and young adults. By using the Z1 app and a prepaid card linked to their account, teenagers can begin their road to financial independence by learning to manage and spend their money, as well as having a place to receive money they earn through jobs and small businesses.

founders.name: Joao Pedro Thompson, Founder
founders.description: João Pedro is a co-founder and CEO at Z1. Before Z1, he co-founded Vereda, an education startup focused on providing high-quality K12 education at affordable prices for the Brazilian middle-class. He started his career in investment banking at Itau BBA and also worked in the finance department at Kraft Heinz, where he headed LatAm treasury.

founders.name: Thiago Achatz, Founder
founders.description: Thiago is co-founder and COO of Z1. Before that, he was part of the founding teams of Rappi (YCW16) and Grow (Grin YCS18 + Yellow), helping build the digital wallet at Grow.

founders.name: Mateus Craveiro, Founder
founders.description:
Mateus Craveiro is CTO and co-founder at Z1, a digital bank for teenagers in Latam.
Prior to Z1, Mateus was a Principal Software Engineer at Pagar.me (Stripe in Brazil), which was later acquired by StoneCo.

founders.name: Sophie Secaf, Founder
founders.description: Sophie Secaf is a creative strategist, consultant, and cultural researcher. Before founding Z1, Sophie worked as a political researcher in São Paulo and lead YONE, a branding company based in NYC. Secaf specializes in socio-cultural research, consumer insights and brand strategy. She is particularly interested in subcultures and consumer behavior. She is also the co-founder of YAGA festival, a festival focused in the international exchange of global subcultures and queer perspectives.

generated_description:
### Z1: A Digital Banking Experience for Teens in Latin America

Founded in 2019 and hailing from São Paulo, Brazil, Z1 is carving out a niche in the financial technology landscape by targeting teenagers and young adults. As a Y Combinator Batch W21 company, Z1's mission is clear: **to empower the next generation with essential financial tools** through a user-friendly digital banking app and a prepaid card system.

**Why Z1?** 
Z1 understands that financial literacy is key to independence, especially for young people who are just beginning to interact with money. By offering a platform where teenagers can learn to manage their finances, earn money from jobs or small businesses, and spend wisely, they're setting the groundwork for a confident financial future. 

### What They Offer
At its core, Z1 provides a simple yet powerful app that allows users to:
- **Control Spending:** With a prepaid card, teens can make purchases without the worry of incurring debt. This feature is particularly appealing in an age where spending habits can easily spiral out of control.
- **Growth Opportunities:** Users can create groups to save for shared goals, like outings or events, encouraging collaborative financial planning.
- **Real-Time Payments:** Utilizing features like Pix, users can pay and receive money instantly, making financial transactions seamless.
- **Goal-Oriented Savings:** They offer a “GuardardDinheiro” feature, helping users set aside money and reach their financial goals.

### Recent Developments
Z1 recently partnered with **NG.CASH**, the largest Gen Z digital account in Latin America. This strategic move enhances the value proposition for its users by providing a more comprehensive account experience. Users can easily transition from Z1 to NG.CASH, carrying over their funds in just a few taps.

### Team and Vision
With a growing team of 80, led by Group Partner **Aaron Epstein**, Z1 is committed to expanding its offerings and improving user experience. Their vision isn't only about transactions; it's about teaching responsible money management and enhancing the financial literacy of an entire generation.

### Tags
Z1 falls under several fintech categories: fintech, payments, consumer, lending, and neobank, showcasing its diverse capabilities in the financial ecosystem.

### Why It Matters
In a rapidly digitizing world, Z1 is more than just a banking solution; it’s a commitment to developing financially savvy adults. By laying the groundwork for responsible financial habits at a young age, Z1 not only builds customer loyalty but also fosters a new generation that can face economic challenges head-on.

For more information, you can visit [Z1](https://z1.app/). 

In essence, Z1 embodies a future where financial literacy and independence are accessible to all young people in Latin America, helping them to not only learn about money but also to wield it wisely.
